rules_text: You get {V} [i](a research counter)[/i]. Then for each {V} you have, you lose 1 life and create a 2/1 black Rat creature token.
notes:
12.15.22 Cost 2U to 3U.

Sorc: This card is super powerful. I like it, but it’s cards like this that make me want to be careful with how easy it is to get a lot of research.

4.7.23 Made black and costs life.
10.29.23 Combined with Wave of Vermin. Now makes 2/1 Rats instead of 1/1 Insects, MV4 —> MV6
